import React from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { logout } from '../features/authSlice'; const Header = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const { user, isAuthenticated } = useSelector(state => state.auth); const handleLogout = () => { dispatch(logout()); navigate('/'); }; return (
EduActivity Finder
  • Search
  • Categories
  • About
    {isAuthenticated ? ( <>
  • {user?.first_name} {user?.last_name}
    • Profile
      • {user?.user_type === 'provider' && (
    • Dashboard
      • )} {user?.user_type === 'admin' && (
    • Admin Panel
      • )}
    • ) : ( <>
  • Login
  • Sign Up
    • )}
); }; export default Header;
